message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a good deal!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm still not there!
Getting closer to my target, Bob! Meet me here!
I'm getting closer to my target, but I'm not giving up yet!
Last chance, Bob! Meet me here or walk away!
I'm not budging, Alice. You'll have to make a better offer if you want me to accept!
This is my final offer, Bob. If you don't accept, you'll be leaving a lot of money on the table. Don't say I didn't warn you!
I'm not afraid of leaving money on the table, Alice. You'll have to do better than that!
